CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Academy Award of Merit)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Academy Award of Merit)
Citation: To BERNHARD KÜHL and WERNER BLOCK and to the OSRAM GmbH RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT DEPARTMENT for the invention and the continuing improvement of the OSRAM HMI light source for motion picture photography.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To WILLI BURTH and KINOTONE CORPORATION for the invention and development of the Non-rewind Platter System for motion picture presentations.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Nominees: Montage Group Ltd.|Ronald C. Barker|Chester L. Schuler
Citation: To MONTAGE GROUP, LTD. for the development, and to RONALD C. BARKER and CHESTER L. SCHULER for the invention, of the Montage Picture Processor electronic film editing system.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Nominees: Colin F. Mossman|Rank Film Development Group
Citation: To COLIN F. MOSSMAN and RANK FILM LABORATORIES' DEVELOPMENT GROUP for creating a fully-automated, film handling system for improving productivity of high speed film processing.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To EASTMAN KODAK COMPANY for the development of Eastman Color High Speed Daylight Negative Film 5297/7297.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To EASTMAN KODAK COMPANY for the development of Eastman Color High Speed SA Negative Film 5295 for blue-screen traveling matte photography.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To FRITZ GABRIEL BAUER for the invention and development of the improved features of the Moviecam Camera System.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To ZORAN PERISIC of Courier Films Ltd. for the Zoptic dual-zoom front projection system for visual effects photography.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To the CARL ZEISS COMPANY for the design and development of a series of super-speed lenses for motion picture photography.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To IOAN ALLEN of Dolby Laboratories, Inc., for the Cat. 43 playback-only noise reduction unit and its practical application to motion picture sound recordings.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Nominees: John Eppolito|Wally Gentleman|William Mesa|Les Paul Robley|Geoffrey H. Williamson
Citation: To JOHN EPPOLITO, WALLY GENTLEMAN, WILLIAM MESA, LES PAUL ROBLEY and GEOFFREY H. WILLIAMSON for refinements to a dual screen, front projection, image-compositing system.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To JAN JACOBSEN for the application of a dual screen, front projection system to motion picture special effects photography.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To THAINE MORRIS and DAVID PIER for the development of DSC Spark Devices for motion picture special effects.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To TADEUZ KRZANOWSKI of Industrial Light and Magic, Inc., for the development of a Wire Rig Model Support Mechanism used to control the movements of miniatures in special effects.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To DAN C. NORRIS and TIM COOK of Norris Film Products for the development of a single-frame exposure system for motion picture photography.
